Text: Louise Lawler:  From the late 1970s onwards, Lawler’s work has focused on photographing portraits of other artists’ work, giving special attention to the spaces in which they are placed and methods used to make them.
Triplets:<Louise Lawler
2:
ere are the triplets extracted from the text:

<Examples of Lawler's photographs
paintings on the walls of an art collector's opulent home
artwork in the process of being installed in a gallery
sculpture in a gallery being viewed by spectators
3:
--------------------
Text: Louise Lawler:  Along with artists like Cindy Sherman, Laurie Simmons and Barbara Kruger, Lawler is considered to be part of the Pictures Generation.
Triplets:<Louise Lawler
4:
--------------------
Text: Louise Lawler:  Louise Lawler lives in Brooklyn, New York.
